text: Ni shuo:â€œAn la a! Zhuquanzhi zhu a! Ni yu ci shei zhuquan, jiu ci shei zhuquan; yu boduo shei de zhuquan, jiu boduo shei de zhuquan; yu shi shei zungui, jiu shi shei zungui; yu shi shei beijian, jiu shi shei beijian; yiqie caifu jun gui ni zhangguan [zhu 1]. Ni dui wanshi que shi wanneng de [zhu 2].
